price: Nokorε sε, Mena Mede obia ͻsakra n’adwen, na ͻgye die, na odi dwumapa, na ͻfa ͻkwan tenenee no soͻ no bͻne kyε no.
arabic: وَإِنِّي لَغَفَّارٞ لِّمَن تَابَ وَءَامَنَ وَعَمِلَ صَٰلِحٗا ثُمَّ ٱهۡتَدَىٰ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wa-innī laghaffārun liman tāba waāmana waʿamila ṣāliḥan thumma ih'tadā
